summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Natwag Makeup Remover Pads,18 Pack 3.74 Inch Reusable Microfiber Cleansing Pad with Laundry Bag Suitable for All Skin Types,3 Color Facial Cleansing Pad Set. Review Date: 2020/08/04 Store: Natwag Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Natwag', 'Skin Type': 'All Skin,Dry', 'Material Feature': 'Reusable', 'Unit Count': '18.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '18', 'Package Dimensions': '4.4 x 4.37 x 2.59 inches; 3.84 Ounces', 'UPC': '745103569701'} Review Text: I strive to buy products that will cut costs in the long run but that also help the environment. I wear makeup every day and use cotton rounds to remove my makeup which can cost a lot overly time. I switched to these reusable wash pads and not only are they easy to hold because of the hook but they remove my makeup without being harsh on my skin. The wash bag makes it easy to just throw in the washer and protect the quality of the cloths just as I would use for delicates. Review Title: Durable pads for everyday makeup use Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Amtidy Solid Color Vintage Modern Style Elastic Women's Rhinestone Crown Tiara, Bridal Wedding Dance Party Birthday Party Women's Headband Tiara, Queen Tiara With Comb（Silver） Review Date: 2020/08/27 Store: Amtidy Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Material': 'Rubber', 'Fabric Type': 'Elastic', 'Brand': 'Amtidy', 'Item Form': 'Spiral', 'Unit Count': '10.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '11.65 x 5.63 x 3.23 inches; 12.03 Ounces', 'UPC': '782931993780'} Review Text: I love the variety of colors that can fit through the whole year. Living in Florida is very humid most of the year so having headbands to keep your hair away from your face but still adds style to your outfits. They are double lined and super stretchy. I love the vibrant colors and the warmer tones. Review Title: Comfortable + great for all seasons Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: BEYELIAN Lash Shampoo with Brush Eyelash Extension Cleanser Eyelid Foaming Cleanser Lash Foam Shampoo Makeup Remover - For Home & Salon Use Review Date: 2020/09/04 Store: BEYELIAN Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '6.5 x 1.7 x 1.1 inches; 1.94 Ounces'} Review Text: I’ve recently had lash extensions put on for the first time and it’s been an adjustment to care for them and find a product that doesn’t pull lashes while cleaning my makeup off. This is perfect for traveling or carrying in your purse! I highly recommend this because it doesn’t irritate my sensitive eyes and wipes away my makeup after one wash! Review Title: Good lash cleaner! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Facial Skincare,Cucumber Essence Hydrating Moisturizing Revitalizing Hydration Fruit Extract Deep Cleaning Facial Skincare Sheet for All Skin Type Care, 35ml/1.18oz, Pack of 5 Review Date: 2020/10/29 Store: PalNour Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {} Review Text: Smells good and works wonders on your skin!

Having combination skin I lack moisture in my t-zone so this mask really helped to rehydrate my skin! Review Title: Hydrating! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Dr.Althea Multi-Action Infusion Serum - 56 Packets of Light weight Gel Serum Review Date: 2020/12/10 Store: Dr.Althea Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Dr.Althea', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Protein,Calluses,Anti-aging', 'Package Dimensions': '6.8 x 5.7 x 1.3 inches; 5.61 Ounces'} Review Text: I’ve been carrying these individually packaged serums for after a workout. I’ve been wearing masks for long periods of time and I’ve noticed my skin needed a little tlc. I’ve been washing my face more times a day and applying this serum all over my face and neck. I’ve noticed my skin looks brighter and hydrated since using this product. Review Title: Glowing skin! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Multicolors Crimped Bobby Pins, 96 Counts 2 Inches Non Slip Grip Hair Pins For Women, Safe Rubber Tips & Strong Grip Bob Pins, Bobby Pins Blonde, Black, Brown, Green Review Date: 2020/12/27 Store: DARONGFENG Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'DARONGFENG', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Color': 'Gray,Green,Brown', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Metal, Rubber', 'Package Dimensions': '4.8 x 3.8 x 0.7 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'Hair pins-D96-4', 'UPC': '741416436082'} Review Text: [[VIDEOID:2cdede7e71d7fcbe49c85fc3e6dd4373]] These Bobby pins are great to have if you want them to blend in with your hair color or give you a pop of color. I have almost jet black hair so using the gold Bobby pins with gold accessories looks really nice. Can’t wait to try different styles with the Bobby pins besides the cross cross I’ve been doing. Review Title: Great variety pack! Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Empty Amber Glass Spray Bottles - (4 Pack) 16 oz with Labels Refillable Container for Essential Oils, Cleaning Solutions, Cleaning Products, Hair, Plant Mister, Daily Shower, Gardening or Aromatherapy Review Date: 2021/01/12 Store: AYL Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'AYL', 'Material': 'Glass', 'Capacity': '16 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '4', 'Product Care Instructions': 'Hand Wash Only', 'Package Dimensions': '9.88 x 7.6 x 7.17 inches; 2.98 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'EmptyAmberGlassSprayBottles 4 Pack', 'UPC': '860005177202'} Review Text: [[VIDEOID:c6772df5dbc6852104055655b1eb7]] These bottles are great for having a cohesive style of spray bottles for all of your home cleaning sprays. You can make your own labels with a label maker or even print some on a thicker paper and tape them to the bottles. I’ve been making my own sprays for cleaning using essential oils. I want to have more nautical products to deep clean my house. The lids are great for back up cleaning supplies and the funnel is so helpful for little to no waste. Review Title: Great quality! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Argan Magic Color Protection Hair Mask – Nourishes, Hydrates & Helps to Protect Color Treated Hair | Enriched with Moringa Oil & Botanical Extracts | Made in USA | Paraben Free | Cruelty Free (8 oz) Review Date: 2021/03/03 Store: Argan Magic Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Argan Magic', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Material Feature': 'Natural, Cruelty Free, Paraben Free', 'Hair Type': 'Color Treated', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating', 'Package Dimensions': '4.45 x 4.09 x 3.43 inches; 8 Ounces', 'UPC': '605923470710'} Review Text: Constantly color and using heat styling tools in my hair that using hair masks keeps my hair healthy and maintained. I use this hair mask that not only smells clean and refreshing after I shampoo my hair and I let it absorb for about 5 mins in a shower cap then I rinse it out. My hair feels so smooth and healthy! Review Title: Great mask for color treated hair! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Reusable Shower Cap for Women – Leakproof, Nonslip Hair Cap for Shower w/ Comfy Flexiband – Soft, Breathable Shower Caps for Women Reusable Waterproof – Durable, Heavy Duty Shower Cap by SMPL OBJECTS (Marble) Review Date: 2021/03/17 Store: SMPL objects Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'SMPL objects', 'Material': 'Polyester', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Pattern': 'Marble', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '9.21 x 6.97 x 0.67 inches; 0.63 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'SMPL Objects', 'Country of Origin': 'China'} Review Text: This tropical lovely shower cap with a bow not only have vibrant, and fun colors but multiple uses.It can be use when cooking, swimming or if you have your hair messy or dirty to cover it up. The bow detailing gives it a feminine touch and it’s so comfortable to wear! Review Title: Great for many uses! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 26 pcs letters Hairpin, hair clips for women hair accessories, DIY barrettes Review Date: 2021/03/29 Store: JEBDY RUBBY Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'JEBDY RUBBY', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Metal', 'Unit Count': '26.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '3.27 x 3.23 x 1.26 inches; 2.08 Ounces'} Review Text: [[VIDEOID:aeba6b8cba447789a6a04eee5e7f9abe]] These alphabet hair clips are great for writing out your name or nickname! They are easy to read and are vibrant with dark hair. Review Title: Cute hair detail! Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
**Shopping Preferences and Trends:**

1. **Sustainability and Cost-Effectiveness**: A strong inclination towards reusable and eco-friendly products is evident (e.g., reusable makeup remover pads, amber glass spray bottles).

2. **Skin and Hair Care**: Consistent purchases in skin and hair care suggest a focus on hydration, comfort, and maintaining beauty routines. They prefer products that help with moisture for different skin types and hair treatments for color protection.

3. **Makeup and Accessories**: Frequent buying of makeup removal and eyelash cleansing products indicates a dedication to looking polished and maintaining cosmetics. Additionally, a keen interest in headbands and hair accessories points to styles that are both functional and fashionable.

4. **Variety and Aesthetics**: The preference for vibrant colors and versatile accessories (e.g., colorful hairpins and elastics) signifies an enjoyment of personalization in style.

5. **Convenience**: The purchase of travel-friendly items like lash shampoo and small serums reflect a lifestyle that values efficiency and practicality. 

6. **Quality and Comfort**: A trend toward high-rated products that are easy to use and provide comfort (e.g., durable hair caps, comfortable shower caps) also emerges.

Overall, the individual's shopping behavior highlights a balance between functionality, personal style, sustainability, and the maintenance of beauty routines.

target_interaction.title: Great quality!
target_interaction.text: [[VIDEOID:3b7652b9e34c875d35924b2441d9f67b]] Loved the scrunches for my friends bachelorette party this weekend! The scrunches are great for doing face masks, wearing on your wrist or for helping to keep your makeup out of your face while applying makeup. They are good quality and a great accessory for your friends!
target_interaction.title_meta: STARAMZ 7 Set Bachelorette Scrunchies Bridesmaid Proposal Gifts Hair Ties for Women Bachelorette Party Favors ( Blush)
